com.example.android.funkytasks

Class Bid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.android.funkytasks.Bid

  • public class Bid
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a constructor for all the bids in the project. It serves as a template for a bid and its information and ensures each bid has the same format throughout the project.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bid(java.lang.String bidder, java.lang.String requester, java.lang.Double amount, java.lang.String taskID)
      The Bid class stores all the bids in our project and ensures they all have the same format and attributes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAmount()
      Returns the amount of money the bid was placed at
      java.lang.String getBidder()
      Returns the user that bidded on the task
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns the ID of the bid
      java.lang.String getRequester()
      Returns the user who posted the task to the app
      java.lang.String getStatus()
      gets the status of the bid
      java.lang.String getTaskID()
      Returns the ID of the task on which the bid was placed
      void setAccepted()
      Sets the Bid of a task to "accepted", which indicates that the task has been assigned.
      void setAmount(double amount)
      Sets the amount of the bid
      void setBidder(java.lang.String bidder)
      Sets the bidder username
      void setDeclined()
      Sets the Bid of a task to "declined".
      void setId(java.lang.String newId)
      Sets the ID of the bid
      void setRequester(java.lang.String requester)
      Sets the requester as the user who posted the task to the app
      void setStatus()
      sets the status of the bid to be blank
      void setTaskID(java.lang.String taskID)
      Assigns a task ID to the bid so the bid and task can be associated

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bid

        public Bid(java.lang.String bidder,
           java.lang.String requester,
           java.lang.Double amount,
           java.lang.String taskID)
        The Bid class stores all the bids in our project and ensures they all have the same format and attributes. An instance of the bid class is instantiated for every bid that is placed in the project.
        Parameters:
        bidder - a string representing the user that bidded on the task
        requester - a string representing the user that posted the task
        amount - a double representing the currency amount of the bid
        taskID - a string representing the unique task ID of the task the bid was placed on
